        "source": "sfdc",
        "connection": "conf/application.conf",
        "table": "account",
        "fields": [
            "Id",
            "Name"
           
        ],
        "output": "/resources/datagen/process/Rules_Temp_Accounts.csv"
    },
    "transform": {
    	"query" : "",
    	"useQuery" : false,
        "tableInfo": [
            {
                "file": "/resources/datagen/process/Rules_Temp_Accounts.csv",
                "table": "account",
                "joinColumnName": "Name",
                "columns": [
                    {
                        "name": "Id",
                        "alias": "Id"
                    }
                ]
            },
            {
                "file": "/testdata/sfdc/RulesEngine/Data/Rules_Accounts.csv",
                "table": "accounts",
                "joinColumnName": "Name",
                "columns": [
                	{
                        "name": "Name",
                        "alias": "Name"
                    },
                  
                    {
                        "name": "Data_ExternalId__c",
                        "alias": "Data_ExternalId__c"
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "AccountNumber",
                        "alias": "AccountNumber"
                    },
                    {
                        "name": "Employees",
                        "alias": "NumberOfEmployees"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "join": true,
        "picklist": false,
        "output": "/resources/datagen/process/Rules_Temp1_Accounts.csv"
    },
    "load": {
        "target": "sfdc",
        "sObject": "Account",
        "operation": "upsert",
        "contentType": "CSV",
        "externalIDField": "Id",
        "file": "/resources/datagen/process/Rules_Temp1_Accounts.csv"
    }
